text: John Ramsay, 1st Lord Bothwell (born about 1464, died 1513) was a Scottish lord. In Parliament on 24 February 1484, James III of Scotland gave him the barony (title) of Bothwell. He forfeited the title on 8 October 1488 and became Sir John Ramsay of Trarinzeane. Category:1460s births Category:1513 deaths Category:Scottish nobility
title: John Ramsay, 1st Lord Bothwell
